overview:
Hailing from North Carolina, Hannah offers a fresh prospective to the Cadence Marketing team. A long standing member of The National Honor Society and the Phi Theta Kapa National Honor Society, Hannah was consistently within the top 5% of her classes in both high school and college. Formerly the Head Internet Marketing Research Analyst of Eco Marketing in Raleigh, NC, she is an expert in search engine optimization and can assist any companyâ€™s website in gaining the exposure it needs to land the all mighty referral. Hannah also has a background in direct marketing strategy and marketing research, making her an important part to any advertising endeavor.

When she is not watching TV or writing music, Hannah can usually be found teaching herself to cook.
